website_summaries.verdict: The word that describes this serrated knife best is "versatile". We recommend it for both bread slicing and meat carving, because the blade is super sharp and very flexible.
pros: Inexpensive stamped metal construction, affordably priced
Works well as a meat carving knife
cons: Some users find the blade to be too flexible, not easy to control

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like butter
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! It cuts through hard crusted bread like it's cutting through butter. You'l Not be disappointed, trust me! Jules
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great Bread Knife
customer_reviews.text: Really nice knife, slide of bread is easy without destroying the loaf.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cruz-Torres

customer_reviews.title: An effective and attractive bread knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife to help cut my homemade sweet and white bread. It does the job effortlessly, is made of good quality materials, and is an attractive addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Its a good knife. I needed a long one.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a longer bread knife to use with my new bread slicer.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Danko

customer_reviews.title: It cuts
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bread knife it does what it’s suppose to do cut bread
customer_reviews.author: cameron wade parker

customer_reviews.title: Best bred knife ever
customer_reviews.text: We cut a lot of bread-maker bread - big square loaves. This knife cut perfect 1/2 inch slices - WOW
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: Bread Knife
customer_reviews.text: A little longer then I anticipated, but nicely balanced for such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stove jockey

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap bread knife
customer_reviews.text: OK, it's no Wusthof, but you find these in commercial kitchens everywhere because they sure go through a loaf of bread. For the price, if it ever goes dull in home service, you don't have to look for someone that can sharpen a serrated blade properly. Retire it and get another. In home service, it should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bread knife. Nice heft, fine balance, if your hands tend large, the handle is a treat, nice & big. Goes right through thick crusts, and doesn't shred soft, bread interiors. Good, strong blade. Handle color just as depicted. Every time I cut bread with it, I find myself singing the national anthem.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Breines

customer_reviews.title: A very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I had a bread knife but needed a longer one to use with my bread slicing guide. This one is just long enough and very sharp. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenixx

customer_reviews.title: Terrific knife. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic knife and a real bargain. Good solid blade that even cuts the thick crusts on my wife’s homemade bread easily. Extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara-Garnett Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Knife is great! Best bread slicer I have ever seen!
customer_reviews.author: James A Weese Jr

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: When I used this the first time it was just the right size for my brisket and cut through it like it was butter
customer_reviews.author: doug

product_meta.title: Cook N Home 10-Inch Wavy Serrated Stainless Steel Bread Slicer Knife, Green
product_meta.description: The Cook N Home 10-Inch Wavy Serrated Stainless Steel Bread Slicer Knife, Green has a stainless steel blade with serration for durability/balance and stays sharp. Bread knife is designed to cut through crust quickly and keeps inside whole. Multipurpose for pastry, vegetables, fruits, etc. Long blade for slicing wide items. Textured handle with ergonomic shape for comfort. Brightly colored for visibility/safety. Dishwasher safe, hand wash recommended and dry immediately.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel blade with serration for durability/balance and stays sharp
Bread knife is designed to cut through crust quickly and keeps inside whole
Multipurpose for pastry, vegetables, fruits, etc.; Long blade for wide items
Textured handle with ergonomic shape for comfort; Brightly colored
Dishwasher safe, hand wash recommended and dry immediately
